com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data
Class TreeBeanModelReader

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.data.TreeBeanModelReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataReader<java.util.List<ModelData>>
public class TreeBeanModelReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataReader<java.util.List<ModelData>>

A DataReader for beans using a BeanModelFactory. Valid return types are a list of beans . Beans must be of the same type and beans must implement BeanModelTag or have a companion BeanModelMarker marker class.

          Reads the raw data and returns the typed data.
 void setFactoryForEachBean(boolean factoryForEachBean)
          Set to true to create a BeanModelFactory for each bean in the list (defaults to false).
